modName: T71 - Switch Race On The Fly Spell
summary: Allow to change player race on the fky
descriptionHtml:
[center]
Description:
This mod (made for personal use and fun), adds a new spell:
T71 - Switch Race On The Fly - Self
that allows to change player race on the fly
without loosing current player stats
amd keeping most of original race facial settings.

Pleae note:
Not suitable for female, argonian and kajiith race
(weird effect, mismatch face/body)

in the next update i will insert flags to exclude them.

Requirements:
SKSE
NiOverRide

Installation:
NMM: As usual
Manual: Unpack archive, drop contents in Data/ and activate .esp[/center]
author: Tiranno71

files.name: T71 - Switch Race On The Fly - Self
files.fileName: T71 - Switch Race On The Fly - Self-82365-.rar
